```{css styling}

.box {
  border: 1px solid #c3c3c3;
  border-radius: 5px;
  float: left;
  margin-bottom: 1em;
  margin-top: 0em;
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
}

.box:before {
  content: none !important;
  display: none !important;
  height: 0px !important;
}

.box:hover {
  border: 1px solid black;
}


.box h2 {
  border-bottom: none;
  font-size: min(max(1em, 5vw), 2em);
  margin-top: 0.2em !important;
  margin-left: 0.2em;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  padding-top: 0;
  width: 90%;
}


.box .card-body {
  margin-top: -1em;
}

.box .box-image {
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
}


.lecture-image {
  float: left;
  width: 50%;
}

.lecture-overview {
  float: right;
  font-size: min(max(0.6em, 2vw), 1em);
  position: relative;
  width: 50%;
}

.footer {
  float: left;
  margin-top: -1em;
  padding: 0;
  width: 100%;
}

.date {
  color: #555;
  font-size: min(max(0.5em, 3vw), 1em);
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  position: absolute;
  right: 0.4rem;
  top: 0.6em;
}


[data-theme='dark'] .box {
    border-color: #555
} .box:hover {
border-color: #aaa
} .date {
color: #ccc
}

```

```{r card-creation}

card <- function(file, date, image_class = "") {
  
  overview <- try(rvest::read_html(here::here("docs", "slides", paste0(file, ".html"))) |>  
  rvest::html_nodes("#overview") |> 
  rvest::html_nodes("ul"), silent=TRUE)
  
  if(class(overview)=="try-error") overview <- ""
  
  # replace links, which are just of the format #link, with full href
  overview <- gsub('a href="#', glue::glue('a target="_blank" href="slides/{file}.html#'), overview)
  
  # find the right cover image
  # some .png, some .svg, so need to look up what's available
  
  files <- list.files(here::here("slides", "covers"))
  image <- files[stringr::str_detect(files, file)]
  image <- ifelse(length(image)==0, "01_course-info.svg", image)
  
  htmltools::HTML(glue::glue(
    '
<div class="date">{date}</div>

<div class="lecture-card">

  <div class="card-body">
    <div class="lecture-image">
<p><a href="slides/{file}.html" target="_blank"><img src="slides/covers/{image}" class="box-image {image_class}"></a></p>
    </div>

    <div class="lecture-overview">
      <div class="overview-list">{overview[[1]]}</div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="footer">
<a class="btn btn-outline-dark" href="slides/{file}.html" target="_blank" role="button" style="width: 50%">Slides</a><a class="btn btn-outline-dark" href="slides/{file}.html" target="_blank" role="button" style="width: 50%">Panopto</a>
  </div>

</div>
    '
  ))
}
```
